=== About Me ===

I'm interested in HPC and currently working on clusters , and building linux clusters with Ubuntu.
I'm also contributing with ubuntu-ir - the Iranian Ubuntu Team website - .

I've established a conferences about OSS and another one about Ubuntu linux in our university with the help of other students.
